decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (EX00 Revision -, EX01 Revision -, EX02 Revision -,  EX03 Revision -,  EX04 Revision -,  EX05 Revision -,  EX06 Revision -,  EX07 Revision -, received 16/10/2013, Unnumbered Flood Risk Assessment, received 21/10/2013, P01 Revision -, P02 Revision -, P03 Revision A, P04 Revision -, P05 Revision A, P06 Revision -, P07 Revision A, received 09/01/2014) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 4 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the walls of the extension hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 5 - The roof area of the extension hereby permitted shall not be used as a balcony, roof garden or similar amenity area without the grant of further specific permission from the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 6 - No development shall take place until detailed drawings of the proposed porch including details of the proposed materials to be used in the construction of the porch have been submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority. Development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved details.
description: Erection of a single storey rear extension and a rear roof extension.
